thread.title: Vehicle Parts Replacement Rate Reports Now Available from Hedges & Company
thread.title_full: Vehicle Parts Replacement Rate Reports Now Available from Hedges & Company - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Vehicle Parts Replacement Rate Reports Now Available from Hedges & Company
text:
Hedges & Company
Reports Provide Number of Vehicles in Need of Parts or Service in 2016
HUDSON, Ohio , Sept. 28, Hedges & Company, an automotive market research firm, has introduced Vehicle Parts Replacement Reports for 2016. The reports cover 27 different product categories and nearly 100 parts and services car and light truck owners will buy in the next year.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150928/271336LOGO
Hedges & Company Vehicle Parts & Services Replacement Reports provide detailed information on the number of vehicles getting specified parts or services. The reports present data by total vehicles on the road and are segmented by age of vehicle, geographic region and vehicle make. The data is also provided for popular vehicle types such as light trucks & SUVs, JeepÂ® and American and European performance models.
"These reports offer valuable market insight companies can use to determine sales potential and identify new markets for growth," said Julie Hedges , principal at Hedges & Company. "There is a lack of quantifiable data available that allows aftermarket businesses and those selling in the aftermarket to measure the size or potential of a specific market. The Vehicle Replacement Rate Reports provide real numbers for them to work with."
Manufactures, business owners, product and brand managers will find the data presented helpful in understanding the markets they sell to. The reports provide benchmarks businesses can use to measure against and set goals with. Whether those needs are in identifying a specific number of parts or services that will be sold or determining which market to expand into, the research provided in the Vehicle Replacement Rate Reports will be a valuable resource.
Reports are available for the following automotive product categories: Air Conditioning, Batteries and Alternators, Brakes, Chassis Parts, Engine, Gaskets and Belts, Exhaust and Emissions, Fuel System Parts, Heating and Radiator, Ignition and Electrical, Oil and Filters, Shocks and Suspension, Spark Plugs and Timing, Steering Parts, Transmission, Wheels and Tires and Windshield. The reports are available by product category or by individual part or service. They can be purchased online at http://hedgescompany.com/research-store/replacement-rate-reports and easily downloaded. A free sample report is also available online.
ABOUT HEDGES & COMPANY
Hedges & Company is a market research and digital marketing agency specializing in the automotive aftermarket. The company has extensive experience helping clients with business-to-business and consumer research studies in addition to its own Buyer Zoom and Brand Zoom syndicated reports. Hedges & Company offers a full-range of digital marketing services to the aftermarket including paid search, search engine optimization (SEO), social media management, email marketing, vehicle registration lists and data.
Media Contact: Julie Hedges , Principal, Hedges & Company, (234) 380-1650
